recipesJson.name: Simple Black and Peach
recipesJson.author: Edger
recipesJson.description:
My First try at a recipe!!!
A Blackberry Peach Lemonade. 
Yes, it's simple but give this a try and please critique as a little constructive criticism is welcome.
Please let me know what you think.

reviews.text: I made this with your listed ingredients, allowed it to steep for 2 weeks, tried it today on my dripper at .45 ohms.  I am a fan of the each of three flavors you used and that's why this recipe caught my attention. I personally found the blackberry to be a little over powering the peach, which I barely taste and I think the lemon needs to pop just a hair. This isn't a bad start, but I believe you can take this to the next level with a couple tweeks. I would like to remake this turning down the blackberry down to 4%, adding 1% cap lemon sicily, turn down the tfa peach down to 4% and adding INW peach at 2%.  Don't ever get discouraged, this is my personal opinion.
